name: Magic Carpet 2: The Netherworlds

execute.description: NETHERW.EXE low res invert mouse (f7 da b9 c8)
NETHERW.EXE hi res invert mouse (f7 d9 83 fb)

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxMagicCarpet2.conf
  gogid: 1207659187
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxMagicCarpet2_single.conf
installer:
- task:
    args: /SILENT /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
- execute:
    args: -c 'mv $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG\ Games/*/* $GAMEDIR'
    description: cleaning...
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: -c 'rm -rf $GAMEDIR/drive_c $GAMEDIR/dosdevices $GAMEDIR/*.reg'
    description: cleaning...
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: -i 's|mount C "..\\GAME"|mount C "GAME"|g' $GAMEDIR/dosboxMagicCarpet2_single.conf
    file: /bin/sed
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: -i 's|imgmount D "..\\game.ins"|imgmount D "game.gog"|g' $GAMEDIR/dosboxMagicCarpet2_single.conf
    file: /bin/sed
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: '-c "echo \"009f1ad: 90 90\" | xxd -r - $GAMEDIR/game.gog"'
    description: NETHERW.EXE low res invert mouse (f7 da b9 c8)
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- execute:
    args: '-c "echo \"009f1f3: 90 90\" | xxd -r - $GAMEDIR/game.gog"'
    description: NETHERW.EXE hi res invert mouse (f7 d9 83 fb)
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxMagicCarpet2.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: opengl
